ModMetaData.name: BetaTraps - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: Dorely
ModMetaData.description: Add back in the rearmable deadfall traps from b18 to 1.0 (This is the dev version of BetaTraps. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
